archive 1.1.11.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

archive (development version)

archive 1.1.112025-02-05

  • No changes.

archive 1.1.102024-11-08

  • No changes.

archive 1.1.92024-09-12

  • No changes.

archive 1.1.82024-04-28

  • archive_extract() now stop reading the input file once the desired files are extracted, instead of always reading to the end of the file (#85, @allenluce).

archive 1.1.72023-12-11

  • Fixed an unsafe printf() format string (#95).

archive 1.1.62023-09-18

  • Fixed compilation issues on Big-endian platforms (#84, @barracuda156).

archive 1.1.52022-05-06

  • archive now does not produce broken archives on Windows (#72, @cielavenir).

archive 1.1.42022-01-30

  • archive_write_dir() now works with relative paths (#69).

  • archive now works properly on UCRT Windows R.

archive 1.1.32021-11-30

  • Gábor Csárdi is now the maintainer.

archive 1.1.22021-10-25

  • Fix UBSAN error related to the progress bar initialization (#55)

  • Fix unterminated progress bars in archive_write() and friends (#60, @salim-b)

archive 1.1.12021-10-13

  • archive_extract() now returns the extracted files (invisibly) (#50)

  • archive_extract(), archive_write_files() and archive_write_dir() gain progress bars using the cli package (#49)

  • Remove uses of deprecated function glue::collapse().

archive 1.1.02021-08-05

  • archive_extract() gains a strip_components argument to strip leading pathname components if desired (#27)

  • archive(), archive_read(), archive_extract() and file_read() now all accept R connections in addition to file paths. This allows you to do things like read remote archives with a url() or curl::curl() connection like you would a file on disk (#7)

archive 1.0.22021-07-16

  • skip tests failing on non-UTF-8 systems

archive 1.0.12021-07-09

  • Fix encoding issues with non-UTF-8 linux systems.

archive 1.0.02021-06-30

  • Initial release

Contents

Developed by Jim Hester, Gábor Csárdi, RStudio.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
